fieldUpdates.description: Job Assignment must be blanked out when cloning a new job.

rules.description: When an AE gets assigned to a job, they get notified ONLY on approved job.

rules.fullName: Alert Collections for certified%2Funion project types
rules.description: Email notification sent to collections for all Jobs with a Project Type of 'Prevailing Wage / Certified' or 'Union'

rules.fullName: Alert File Clerk when Jobs are marked Lost
rules.description: Email notification to flie clerk when Opportunity Stage is set to Lost

rules.fullName: Alert payroll when job is PW%2C union%2C or biohazard
rules.description: If project type is union, certified or division is biohazard, and only if job stage is Won, notify Payroll and set task for Project Manager for new hire orientation. Task Due date is 6 hours within assignment
Email Alert to Branch Managers to assign a Project Director to a Job.

rules.fullName: BM email for PD assignment- SF%2FSJ
rules.description: Email Alert to Branch Managers to assign a Project Director to a Job.
When this checkbox is check, it will send email to EVP's, BM, PM, Super, and Ops Manager.

rules.fullName: Clear PN Request Date if Send Prelim is No

rules.description: Stamps the Date that a Job's Stage was set to Complete

rules.fullName: Construction Job to Blank Ops Manager
rules.formula: AND( OR( TEXT(Division__c )== 'Construction', TEXT(Division__c )== 'Marketing' ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Division__c ) ))

rules.description: Workflow email alert to notify PM and AE that there is an ERA related to a Job

rules.fullName: Email Alert to Scott Moore for new Orange E%2FS jobs

rules.description: Field update to clear out 'Add/Correct Email' field after trigger to populate updated email onto Contact record
When City of LA throws an error, it will send an email to recipient
Notification goes to: Gary Moore Doug Fairless Tom McGuire Luan Nguyen Channyn Rowe
Update proposed job cost adjustment to bring a jobs gross profit to estimated
Outbound message to Timberline via Jitterbit to request Forecast Analysis fields be updated
Outbound message to send Opportunity fields to Timberline via Jitterbit
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISCHANGED(StageName),ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Won")) ,Sync_to_Timberline__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED(PM_Approval_Only__c), AND(ISCHANGED(Project_Manager_new__c), NOT(ISNULL( Last_Successful_Timberline_Update__c)), X1sub__c = FALSE))

rules.description: Clears job start date and completion date when job is marked "Lost"
When Job name has changed, email Vonda Barela that Job name has changed.
When Job number has changed, email Jenny Pace, Vonda Barela, and payroll.
Stamps the Date that a Job's Stage was set to Won (and overwrites Job Start Date each time)

rules.fullName: Job Workflow for LA County Educational
rules.description: If Job is LA county educational or governmental and stage is won, mark the Job as union. Look at Job class (school or government agency) and county is LA.
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( County__c , "Los Angeles"), ISPICKVAL( StageName,"Won"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Municipality/ Gov't"), ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Educational") ))

rules.description: If Job is SD USD, mark the Job as Certified. Look at Job class (school or government agency) and county is SD
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( County__c , "San Diego"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Municipality/ Gov't"), ISPICKVAL( Job_Class__c , "Educational") ))

rules.description: Population of the Last Job Date to be used in Bonus calculations of New Business vs. Existing Business.
A workflow email alert will be created to alert a Project Director immediately following Job assignment.
Workflow field update to populate Opportunity Name with 'Job Name | Job Number'
Ops Manager Assignment workflow
Sends an email when a Project Manager is assigned to a job
Records date/time of last change to/from Won Stage
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Won") ), AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Won")) )

rules.description: Populates the previous job name if job name is changed.
Records the user that modified the 'Send Prelim' field and the date/time of modification.

rules.fullName: Send client welcome email when job is marked won
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.description:
Sends client welcome email when the job is marked as won and there is a superintendent/operations manager entered
Changed:
Opportunity: Super_Ops to Project Manager New Full Name criteria
Sets the modified allocations field to "22.5" for jobs where PM is Rudi Suminski, Brian Bailey, Consultant, Thomas Moreno, Andy England, or Aaron Berkman.

rules.fullName: Set PN Request Date if Send Prelim is Yes
Set Send Prelim field to no for program jobs
rules.description: Update 'Send Prelim' field to 'No' for most program Jobs, all national accounts (lead source), all contents, marketing, and consulting jobs, educational and municipal/gov't jobs (job class), certain accounts, and all jobs in certain states.
rules.formula:
ISPICKVAL(Send_Prelim__c, "") &&
((BEGINS(TEXT(LeadSource), "Program") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Program - Contractor Connection"))) ||
BEGINS(TEXT(LeadSource),"National Account") || ISPICKVAL(Division__c,"Contents") || ISPICKVAL(Division__c,"Marketing") || ISPICKVAL(Division__c,"Consulting") || ISPICKVAL(Job_Class__c,"Educational") || ISPICKVAL(Job_Class__c,"Municipality/ Gov't") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Allstate") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Alacrity") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Encompass") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "CSAA") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Farmers") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Watterson") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "JC Penney") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "JP Morgan Chase") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Wyndham Worldwide") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "National Community Renaissance") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Burlington Northern") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Facility Source") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Jones Lang LaSalle Americas") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "2B Adjusting") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Essex Property Trust") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Wal-Mart") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "City of Phoenix") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Aimco Property Management") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Cushman & Wakefield") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "St. Joseph's Hosp.") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Walgreens") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Watterson Environmental Group") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Prometheus Real Estate Group") || BEGINS(Account.Name, "Irvine Company") || Project_Site_State__c = "CO" || Project_Site_State__c = "CT" || Project_Site_State__c = "DE" || (Project_Site_State__c = "FL" && ISPICKVAL(Job_Class__c,"Residential")) || Project_Site_State__c = "HI" || Project_Site_State__c = "ID" || Project_Site_State__c = "IL" || Project_Site_State__c = "KY" || Project_Site_State__c = "MD" || Project_Site_State__c = "NE" || Project_Site_State__c = "NJ" || Project_Site_State__c = "NY" || Project_Site_State__c = "ND" || Project_Site_State__c = "PA" || Project_Site_State__c = "VT")

rules.fullName: Task reminder to PM to call customer at 42 hours after approval
rules.description: Automatic task creation 42 hours after approval of an opportunity if the PM has not yet modified the record.

rules.fullName: Update 1sub checkbox%2C PM%2C and PM Approval Only checkbox
rules.description: If Cort Gilliam is the Project Director, check the 1sub checkbox, assign the PM as Pete Carlson, and check the PM Approval Only checkbox.

rules.fullName: Update Close Date when Won or Lost
Update Forecast Last Timberline Update Field
rules.description: Date/Time stamp of 'Update Forecast' field marked to True
Workflow to update Job Gross Profit
Updates Last Timberline Update field with current date time when a record is saved.
rules.formula: OR(Sync_to_Timberline__c = TRUE, AND(ISCHANGED(Superintendent__c), NOT(ISNULL( Last_Successful_Timberline_Update__c)), X1sub__c = FALSE))

rules.description: Kelli Smith would like to be notified for any lead is created for bay area.

tasks.description: Call the Union, bring in workers for new hire orientation and contact payroll to discuss hiring procedures. Task is due within 6 hours of creation. Escalate to Steve if not completed.
tasks.subject: Call Union, Bring in New Hires & Contact Payroll

tasks.description: It has been 42 hours since this Job has been approved and the record. Please follow up with the client.
tasks.subject: Reminder to follow up with job contact
